recipe.title: Grilled Rib-Eye Steaks with Cucumber Relish
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon finely chopped jalapeño chili, or to taste (wear rubber gloves)
two 1-inch-thick rib-eye steaks at room temperature
instructions: Make relish: In a bowl combine all ingredients with salt to taste. Season steaks with salt and generously with pepper. Grill steaks on an oiled rack set 5 to 6 inches over glowing coals 4 to 5 minutes on each side for medium-rare meat. (Alternatively, steaks may be grilled in a hot well-seasoned ridged grill pan over moderately high heat in the same manner.) Serve steaks with relish.
